headline: A Look At LKQ (LKQ) Valuation As It Sells Self Service And Specialty Segments
summary: LKQ (LKQ) has moved into focus after recent news that it is selling its Self Service and Specialty segments as part of a wider review and cost cuts targeting US$75 million in annual savings. See our latest analysis for LKQ. That planned exit from Self Service and Specialty comes after a mixed stretch for investors, with an 11.42% 90 day share price return and a 13.35% year to date share price return contrasting with a 36.08% 3 year total shareholder return decline. This suggests recent...
